definition: the act of providing a subsidy, be willing to concede
details:
noun
- the act of providing a subsidy
= synonyms: subsidization, subsidisation
- a right or privilege that has been granted
- a contract granting the right to operate a subsidiary business
= synonyms: concession
- (law) a transfer of property by deed of conveyance
= synonyms: assignment
- any monetary aid
verb
- be willing to concede
= example: be willing to concede
= synonyms: yield, concede
- allow to have
= example: allow to have
= synonyms: accord, allot
- let have
= example: let have
= synonyms: allow
- transfer by deed
= example: transfer by deed
= synonyms: deed over
- give as judged due or on the basis of merit
= synonyms: award
- give over
= synonyms: yield, concede, cede
- bestow, especially officially
= example: bestow, especially officially
= synonyms: give
